comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Also: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5853175542/] Assuming this is the young person in the pictures, this might be Werner Karl Ulrich Ernst August von Bernstorff (* Alt-Karin 11.04.1886 + 05.02.1967). Of all the contenders with this name, this looks like the closest match for someone who looks in his late twenties ca. 1914 Werner Friedrich Bechtold Eberhard Hartwich Hermann von Bernstorff * 1891 Werner Joachim Harry, Graf von Bernstorff * 1839 Werner Karl Ulrich Ernst August von Bernstorff * 1886 Werner Wichard Georg Ferdinand von Bernstorff * 1905 via www.geneall.net/D/fam_names.php?id=11528#w
